name: Covid (Dumb ways to die Inspired)
description:
The central theme of the game is based on the protection measures against Covid-19 in the public transport of Berlin.

The goal of the game is to get the character to use his mask three times correctly.

Credits: 

Created by Luisa Enciso 

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences Berlin.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai

"Games A Week" (Winter Semester 2020/21)
